item.title: Summerize network thoughput by ebpf
item.description: :EXPORT_HUGO_CUSTOM_FRONT_MATTER: :show_comments true Problem We have servers on differnt zones, which have differnt subnets. We want to use ebpf_exporter1 to monitor network thoughput from subnet1 to subnet2. So I need to write some bcc scripts. Some tcp thoughput is sending from subnet1 to subnet2 by ipv6. But the servers haven’t got ture ipv6 address, they have ipv4 addresses embedded into ipv62. ::ffff:192.168.9.255 Code Snippet 1: A manual exmaple for ipv4 address embedded into ipv6 I have two missions:
